title: Reservation for Multiple Public Purposes: Where land is reserved for multiple public purposes in the DP, the distribution of land area/BUA under reservation for each public purpose shall be preferably equal
clause_text: Reservation for Multiple Public Purposes: Where land is reserved for multiple public purposes in the DP, the distribution of land area/BUA under reservation for each public purpose shall be preferably equal.
